nodes.text: Renquet was an Imperial Moff during the Galactic Civil War.

On sampling the cooking of Yeoman Vimran Trell, of the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Adjudicator, Renquet was so impressed with the food, Fromirian roast queg, that he requested the starship became the flagship of his Sector Fleet. Little did he know that Trell used this new position to pass information to the Rebel Alliance and prevent most attacks of the Adjudicator.
